sessionTimeout.title: Auto-Logout on Inactivity
sessionTimeout.description: Automatically log out after 30 minutes of inactivity for security

userManagement.title: User Management
userManagement.showOnce: This password will be shown only once. Make sure to copy it.

forcePasswordChange.title: Password Reset Required
forcePasswordChange.subtitle: Please create a new password to continue

step1.title: Welcome to Albert
step1.description: Your AI-powered assistant platform for building intelligent workflows
step1.intro: Albert combines the power of AI agents, workflows, and intelligent conversations to help you solve complex problems.
step1.chatDescription: Have natural conversations with AI, upload files, and get instant answers
step1.agentsDescription: Create specialized AI agents tailored to specific tasks
step1.workflowsDescription: Build complex multi-agent workflows with a visual canvas

step2.title: Start with Chat
step2.description: The quickest way to get started
step2.intro: The chat interface is your main hub for interacting with AI. You can:
step2.feature1: Upload PDFs, Excel files, images, and documents
step2.feature2: Switch between different AI agents mid-conversation
step2.feature3: Use web search and built-in tools
step2.feature4: View full request payloads for transparency
step2.tip: Tip: Press Ctrl+Enter to send messages

step3.title: Create Custom Agents
step3.description: Build AI assistants for specific tasks
step3.intro: Agents are specialized AI assistants with custom instructions. You can:
step3.feature1: Define system prompts to control agent behavior
step3.feature2: Add custom profile pictures and tags
step3.feature4: Browse the agent marketplace for templates
step3.tip: Tip: Use frameworks from the library

step4.title: Build Workflows
step4.intro: Workflows let you chain multiple agents and functions together:
step4.feature1: Drag and drop agents onto stages
step4.feature2: Connect nodes to pass data between stages
step4.feature3: Add functions like web search and API calls
step4.feature4: Save and share workflows with others
